reviews.review: Valve took everything that was great about the original and made it better - better puzzles, better world-building, better lore, better voice acting, better graphics, better gameplay, more interactive game elements. They took a timeless classic and somehow managed to innovate on top of it. Portal 2 not only provides another stellar single player campaign but a fun and similarly enjoyable multiplayer campaign. The fact that these two titles hold up all these years later speak to how innovative they were in the first place. After playing the first one, be sure to play this timeless classic!
Absolute masterpiece and must play. Stop reading this and play this now.

How to explain the magic of portal? Well, first of all it is a riddle masterpiece, very motivating and diversified - combined with some skills of timing and needed dexterity.
And then there is the other part of the game- the part that is psychologically complex, funny and scary at the same time, combining cold, cool logic in those parts of the game where the players solves the riddles in a laboratory-style environment and dystopia, suspense outside the lab. 
Brilliant!

Literally the best game ever made. It's fun and challenging, the Co-op mode is amazing, and the humor is the best to be found in any game. Also the support for community mods is fantastic. There are some great mods out there, I especially recommend Portal Reloaded, it is good enough to be considered portal 3.
